resources.string: Please fix permissions to avoid crashes!!
Restoring with root requires your ROM to be rooted. This application will be automatically uninstalled.
Restoring with TWRP needs you to boot into TWRP recovery and flash a zipfile. Ideal if you want to keep your device unrooted.

Last button will forcefully delete this app (this requires root); or disable it from making annoying notifications (if not rooted)\n Proceed with caution as you may never be able to restore permissions to backed up apps.

If you change your mind later,

If you are not rooted: Clear data of this app
(Settings -> Apps -> Permission Fixer -> Storage -> Clear data)
and reboot to get permission fix capabilities

 If you are rooted: reflash the backup zip file.
Your system is not rooted or root permission denied!! Try TWRP method.
There was some error! Try TWRP method.
